评论详情: I absolutely loved this shirt! it feels super soft, color and size are accurate. it definitely seems from an expensive brand. I will buy in other colors!

评论概述: Perfect for a hot day at the theme park!
评论详情: This shirt is really comfortable, soft, and light. I bought it to wear with a gold hinge skirt at Disney in August. It was the perfect weight for the oppressive heat. Felt like wearing nothing. And I've worn it a ton since. It washes well but wrinkles easily so remove from the dryer as soon as it's done and then hang it instead of folding it. For travel, wrinkles release easy if you hang it in the steam of a hot shower. (For reference I'm 5'3", 117 lbs, 34D)
It's okay, I thing is pretty lightweight
I bought this in L (I’m 5’8, 137 lbs) in the SS and LS versions. The fit is perfect and the material is soft w/a lovely drape. I’m definitely sold on this company!
This top is super cute and soft, I’m gonna order more
The shirt is so cute. I love the detail with the open back. The material is really soft and comfortable. Also, the length was not too long and not too short with leggings.

I don’t mind this shirt I deff liked the style, I got it in white for the gym but it wrinkles a lot too thin and see through. If you don’t mind that the n for the price it’s not bad and I also got it on sale. Otherwise I wouldn’t buy it again or atleast not this color
Cute, easy, inexpensive gym top. Fit great, would recommend! TTS.
Very flowy and breathable. The back looks so good but the front is a bit flat and gives me a weird shape.
It looked cute on my daughter. It runs tts. (Medium)
Im a short curvy person so it was a perfect fit. I love doing hot yoga so the lightness of the fabric and the design of the back allows for good airflow.

I liked that it was so soft on skin. It's a very lightweight croptop, that wasn't flattering my body type. I have longer and wider than average torso. I'm 5'4 , petite, it was very short on me. Fabric was thin and wrinkles easily, you need to wear a bra with some padding, not a see through.
Not the greatest for long torso and big boobs as it fits a little boxy, but very comfy. Material is very soft
Love the top! Material soft and complimentary! Will purchase ter colors
Cute top to wear with jeans or when working out. True to size. Ordered a Medium and I weigh 142lbs.
This is cute but NOT wicking.  You might as well wear a 100% cotton t-shirt to work out, and expect it to get just as soaked without any quick ability to dry out.

Very lightweight cotton blend. The fit is adorable, with just enough bare midriff to not be obscene. A little loose around the waist, fits well around the shoulders, & dries quickly! Love the cut out in the back. Great for workout!

I bought these shirts for working out/ lounging around and they are so soft and comfortable. Will most likely buy in more colors
It’s so pretty and comfortable! Thing material but good quality
Loved the style and the fabric!
Great workout shirt! Love the fabric. Very comfy.
Great fit

This shirt is both very soft and lightweight, but the lightweight doesn't mean it's too thin or flimsy. The material is light, but substantial and doesn't appear that it will rip or tear easily. The color is vibrant and not faded or "off". The front comes to just below my belly button and the v in the back is in the perfect spot, not being too low. With this type of material and the cutout design, it definitely promotes airflow in the best way. It has a lot of stretch for movement, but isn't too clingy nor baggy. It hits all the right spots and the size fits as expected.

This top is so fun to wear. It’s also super versatile, it’s nice to wear for working out, but also for lounging, running errands. I love it. The fabric is super soft, stretchy and extremely comfy to wear. I would recommend it.

So I am not all about the true crop tops, but this shirt is long enough to hit the top of my hips.  It is short enough it still gives a modern look, but is actually flattering.  I pair it with high-waisted leggings or bike shorts, which works perfectly.The material is comfortable, lightweight, and silky.  The back scoop and cutout details are cute without being too revealing.  It does show a little bit of bra strap though which is a personal pet peeve.  The red color is true to the pics and very vibrant.  I like that the shirt isn't too clingy and skims over the tummy.  Also, it is true to size.Overall, I'd definitely recommend this top, especially as a cute workout/lounge option.

I love this gym shirt! I was a bit hesitant when it arrived as it looked to small, but it fits great. I'm 5'2" and ordered a small. Super flattering, the fabric is extremely soft and the shirt is super comfortable, love how I look when I wear it. I have no complaints, would definitely recommend

Such soft fabric! This top is so cute, light, and soft. I like the crop length - not too short. I am pretty short waisted, it hits somewhere between my belly button and hip bones. I’m kinda meh on the cutout design but I love the overlapping tulip back.

This is a great shirt. It fits well and is very comfortable. It is perfect for doing workouts with the cut-out in the back, letting in lots of air, but it is super cute as an everyday summer shirt as well. The length is perfect, going to just about or under the belly button, and I love how it looks in the back. This is a super cute shirt and well-made. I am very happy with it.

It’s the perfect work out top: comfortable and lightweight. The material is super cool, stretchy yet bouncy. I ordered the large but it fits more like a medium so I would definitely size up if you were looking for the oversized look.

I'd give this top 10 stars if I could! The material is so soft, lightweight and breathable. The fit is true to size and I absolutely love the cut and style, how it's longer in the front and the cutout and draping on the back. Simply marvelous and one of my absolute favorite tops!
It’s stylish, especially from the back. But it’s more athleisure than workout wear.

The shirt is super lightweight, stretchy and comfortable. I have nothing bad to say about this shirt at all. This type of design for workout shirt always feels good because it gives you room to move in and also is a very airy. That way you can keep cool.
it’s exactly like the picture get your normal size i love it
